covenLeaderDescription: You are a voodoo master who can control other peoples actions.
hexMasterDescription: You are a spell slinger with a proficiency for hexes and curses.
hexMasterFinalHex: Everyone has been hexed, let the final hex commence!
hexMasterEveryoneHexed: Everyone has been hexed, now you must wait for the final hex to commence.
hexMasterAlert: You were hexed by the Hex Master!
